repair.repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:14-alpine
WORKDIR /app
COPY . .

RUN npm install
ENV DEEPL_MOCK_SERVER_PORT=3000 DEEPL_MOCK_PROXY_SERVER_PORT=3001
EXPOSE 3000 3001

RUN chown 1000 -R /app

USER 1000

CMD ["npm", "start"]
